column2: making the firefighting efforts more challenging. Jules enters the building to rescue the occupants.

column2: working on a landscape design for a client's backyard. She wants to plant a beautiful rose garden as the centerpiece of the design. column2: assuming it is not live.

Petra prepares to recommend Fertilizer A as the best option for plant growth.
